item.title: Download
item.description:
Hosted

hosted, debian, ubuntu, centos, fedora, arch

Native

If you can use BitTorrent, please do so and leave the client open for a while so you can seed the files for other users. Otherwise, use the direct download.

Community

Keep in mind, we're a loud community of sparse loud monkeys, we're happy to talk nonsense around.
item.dc:creator: Nonsense Web Services
